verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Anio no andro natao ho anay
Andro masina :
Fihaonanay aminao, ry Ray,
Hifandraisana.
Ka faly izahay
Tafahaona indray.
Mihaona aminao, ry Ray,
'Zao Sabata izao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fa heniky ny fitiavanao
Ny androm-piainanay
Ka he tratr'izao
Sabata izao
Hitsaharanay.
Tsaroanay soa tokoa
Ny fitiavanao.
Misaotra Anao 'zahay, ry Ray,
Fa notahianao

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He ! andro notahianao anio,
Tompo tsara ô,
Ka diovy re ny fonay hadio
Mba ho zanakao.
Tompo tia, ô ! avia,
Raiso re izao.
Diovy re ny fonay hadio
Dia ho lapanao.
